rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0001
rows.name: Laura, about that battle earlier..

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0002
rows.name: I know, right? We were phenomenal!

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0003
rows.name: You're trying to do too much.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0004
rows.name:
Aww, what?
I thought you were going to praise me...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm only trying to draw out your
full power, Shin, you know that

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0006
rows.name:
That's fine, and I appreciate it.
What I'm saying is, please don't
put yourself at risk, Laura

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0007
rows.name:
We've been together a long time
haven't we, Shin?

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0008
rows.name:
Ever since I touched your Core Crystal
as a little girl and we became bonded
forever as Driver and Blade...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0009
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0010
rows.name: It's a bond closer than blood, I think.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0011
rows.name:
That's part of the reason why...
I want to help you too, see you grow,
and be there for you.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0012
rows.name:
That's beautiful, Laura, but you're
a Driver and I'm a Blade.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0013
rows.name:
Blades protect their Drivers in a fight.
It's the natural order of things.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0014
rows.name:
Especially since we don't need to
worry about being wounded, as long
as the Core Crystal stays intact.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0015
rows.name:
...While I, on the other hand, am just
a human?

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0016
rows.name:
When a Driver dies, their Blades
return to their Cores...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0017
rows.name:
That's why you want me to be
more careful, right?

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0018
rows.name: Exactly.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0019
rows.name: Hmm... Right, I get it...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0020
rows.name:
Well, it's not like I want to make you
anxious in the middle of a fight...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0021
rows.name:
OK, I promise not to overdo it.
And if things start looking bad,
I'll be sure to switch out for you.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0022
rows.name: That would be great. Thanks.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0023
rows.name: I'm counting on you, then.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0024
rows.name: You know I'd never let you down.
